about_the_game:
Embark on a journey to bring light back to a bleak world. With the official Riders of Icarus update "Rise of the Trickster", the new Trickster class will be available to fight against the forces of dark. Along with this massive update, Riders of Icarus will be introducing a new North American and European server for users to start fresh! Prepare yourselves and enter the fray with the Heroic Trickster's Guile Package and receive the following:

Mount: Malokus (Legendary)
Mount: Armored Bear (Heroic)

Icarian Glory Weapon Skin

Heroic Title
  • Effect: Rare Drop Chance +10%

Premium Service (30 Day)

Designer Bag (24 Slot)
Ellun (100 Pack)

Limit 1 Heroic Trickster's Guile Package per account. Packages are not transferable.
